name: RPG Maker MV Encrypted PNG File

description: When creating a game in RPG Maker MV, the user creates PNG image resources for different elements of the game. When the project is deployed, the images are encrypted and placed in the game directory:
The images are encrypted to protect against modification and are not meant to be manually opened. However, users can decrypt RPGMVP files using Petschkos RPG-Maker MV-File Decrypter.
